Package org.ops4j.peaberry

peaberry - dynamic service extension for Google-Guice.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
AttributeFilter Basic matching filter for service attributes.
Export<T> Handle to a service instance exported in a ServiceScope.
Import<T> Handle to a service instance imported from a ServiceRegistry.
ServiceRegistry A service registry is a @{code ServiceScope} that allows lookup of services.
ServiceScope A service scope can receive exported services with associated attributes.
 

Class Summary
Peaberry Guice extension that supports injection and registration of dynamic services.
 

Exception Summary
ServiceException General purpose service exception.
ServiceUnavailableException Exception thrown when a requested service is not available.
 

Package org.ops4j.peaberry Description

peaberry - dynamic service extension for Google-Guice.

The principal members of this package are:

Peaberry
The builder that can assemble providers to import or export dynamic services.
ServiceUnavailableException
The exception thrown when you attempt to use a service that is not available.
ServiceRegistry
The interface you can implement in order to plug-in other service frameworks.
